scripts.pilot:germex: curl -X POST http://localhost:3000/api/fusion/analyze -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{\"client_id\":\"germex\"}" && curl -X POST http://localhost:3000/api/reports/generate -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{\"client_id\":\"germex\",\"deliver\":\"display\"}"
scripts.pilot:shiftev: curl -X POST http://localhost:3000/api/fusion/analyze -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{\"client_id\":\"shift-ev-egypt\"}" && curl -X POST http://localhost:3000/api/reports/generate -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{\"client_id\":\"shift-ev-egypt\",\"deliver\":\"display\"}"
